post.description: Lock seats for a specific trip to prevent double booking. Seats are locked for a configured duration (default 10 minutes). Returns a lock token that must be used for subsequent booking operations. If any seat cannot be locked, the entire operation fails with no partial locks.

requestBody.description: Trip ID and array of seat IDs to lock

400.description: Invalid seat IDs or validation error

409.description: Trip unavailable, seat locked by others, or seat already booked

post.description: Create a booking using a valid lock token. The lock token must be obtained from the seat lock endpoint first. Validates seat availability, passenger data, and creates booking atomically. All seats will be marked as booked and lock will be released.

400.description: Invalid token, validation error, or seat code mismatch

404.description: Trip not found or seats not found

409.description: Seat locked by another user, already booked, or lock expired
